name: Instructor
flower_description: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.
feather_description: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.
sand_description: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.
goblet_description: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.
circlet_description: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.
four_pc_bonus: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.
